description: Master CIMA BA4 covering Ethics, Corporate Governance, and Business Law

slides.title: Welcome to CIMA BA4
slides.content:
# BA4 - Ethics, Governance and Law

BA4 covers **ethics**, **governance**, and **legal** frameworks.

## What You Will Learn

- **Ethics** - Professional conduct
- **Governance** - Corporate structure
- **Law** - Business legal framework
- **Contracts** - Legal agreements

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Ethics | 25% |
| Governance | 25% |
| Business law | 30% |
| Employment | 20% |

slides.title: Business Ethics
slides.content:
# Professional Ethics

## CIMA Code of Ethics

| Principle | Meaning |
|-----------|--------|
| Integrity | Honest |
| Objectivity | Unbiased |
| Competence | Skilled |
| Confidentiality | Protect info |
| Professional behavior | Proper conduct |

## Ethical Threats

| Threat | Example |
|--------|--------|
| Self-interest | Financial gain |
| Familiarity | Close relationship |
| Intimidation | Pressure |
| Self-review | Own work |
| Advocacy | Client position |

slides.title: Corporate Governance
slides.content:
# Governance Framework

## UK Corporate Governance Code

| Principle | Focus |
|-----------|-------|
| Leadership | Board role |
| Effectiveness | Board composition |
| Accountability | Audit and risk |
| Remuneration | Fair pay |
| Relations | Shareholders |

## Board Composition

| Role | Responsibility |
|------|---------------|
| Chair | Leadership |
| CEO | Execution |
| NED | Independence |
| Audit Committee | Oversight |

slides.title: Company Formation
slides.content:
# Types of Business

## Legal Structures

| Type | Liability |
|------|----------|
| Sole trader | Unlimited |
| Partnership | Unlimited |
| LLP | Limited |
| Company | Limited |

## Company Types

| Type | Features |
|------|----------|
| Private (Ltd) | Restricted shares |
| Public (PLC) | Listed |

## Incorporation

- Registration with Companies House
- Memorandum and articles
- Certificate of incorporation

slides.title: Directors' Duties
slides.content:
# Legal Duties

## Statutory Duties

| Duty | Requirement |
|------|-------------|
| Act in good faith | Company interest |
| Independent judgment | Own decision |
| Reasonable care | Skill and diligence |
| Avoid conflicts | Personal interest |
| Not accept benefits | Third parties |
| Declare interests | Related party |

## Breach Consequences

- Personal liability
- Disqualification
- Criminal penalties

slides.title: Contract Law
slides.content:
# Contract Formation

## Essential Elements

| Element | Meaning |
|---------|--------|
| Offer | Proposal |
| Acceptance | Agreement |
| Consideration | Value exchanged |
| Intention | Legal relations |
| Capacity | Ability |

## Types

| Type | Features |
|------|----------|
| Valid | All elements |
| Void | No effect |
| Voidable | Can cancel |
| Unenforceable | Cannot enforce |

slides.title: Contract Terms
slides.content:
# Terms and Breach

## Types of Terms

| Term | Effect of Breach |
|------|------------------|
| Condition | Terminate + damages |
| Warranty | Damages only |
| Innominate | Depends on effect |

## Remedies

| Remedy | Purpose |
|--------|--------|
| Damages | Compensation |
| Specific performance | Force completion |
| Injunction | Prevent action |
| Rescission | Cancel contract |

slides.title: Employment Law
slides.content:
# Employee Rights

## Contract of Employment

| Must Include | Details |
|--------------|--------|
| Parties | Names |
| Job title | Role |
| Pay | Amount and frequency |
| Hours | Working time |
| Notice | Termination period |

## Key Rights

| Right | Protection |
|-------|------------|
| Equal pay | Gender equality |
| Minimum wage | Floor rate |
| Working time | Maximum hours |
| Leave | Holiday entitlement |

slides.title: Discrimination
slides.content:
# Equality Act 2010

## Protected Characteristics

| Characteristic | Examples |
|----------------|----------|
| Age | All ages |
| Disability | Physical/mental |
| Gender | Male/female |
| Race | Ethnicity |
| Religion | Beliefs |
| Sexual orientation | All |

## Types of Discrimination

| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Direct | Less favorable treatment |
| Indirect | Applies to all but affects group |
| Harassment | Unwanted conduct |
| Victimisation | Retaliation |

slides.title: Employment Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: The Equality Act protects how many characteristics?

slides.title: Data Protection
slides.content:
# UK GDPR

## Principles

| Principle | Requirement |
|-----------|-------------|
| Lawfulness | Legal basis |
| Purpose | Specific use |
| Minimisation | Only necessary |
| Accuracy | Correct |
| Retention | Limited period |
| Security | Protected |

## Rights

| Right | Meaning |
|-------|--------|
| Access | See data |
| Rectification | Correct errors |
| Erasure | Delete data |
| Portability | Transfer |

slides.title: Agency and Tort
slides.content:
# Legal Relationships

## Agency

| Party | Role |
|-------|------|
| Principal | The represented |
| Agent | Acts on behalf |
| Third party | Deals with agent |

## Negligence

```
Duty of care
+ Breach of duty
+ Damage caused
= Negligence claim
```

## Vicarious Liability

Employer liable for employee actions.

slides.title: Fraud and Bribery
slides.content:
# Criminal Law

## Fraud Act 2006

| Type | Method |
|------|--------|
| False representation | Misleading |
| Non-disclosure | Hiding facts |
| Abuse of position | Trust misuse |

## Bribery Act 2010

| Offence | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Active | Offering bribe |
| Passive | Receiving bribe |
| Foreign official | Overseas bribery |
| Corporate | Failure to prevent |
